Title: Establishes the "protect our privacy (POP) act" to impose limitations on the use of drones for law enforcement purposes
Summary: Establishes the "protect our privacy (POP) act" to impose limitations on the use of drones for law enforcement purposes; prohibits the use of drones by law enforcement at concerts, protests, demonstrations, or other actions protected by the first amendment.
LawCode: Add ยง52-e, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to imposing limitations on the use of drones for law enforcement purposes
